title: Check out our plans
highlight: Reduce your observability cost by up to 60%
description: For companies of all sizes and needs

marketplace.label: Or buy directly from the marketplace:

calculator.title: SaaS Pricing Calculator
calculator.description: Estimate your monthly cost based on usage. Values vary with retention period.

selfHosted.title: Dedicated deployment for your company
selfHosted.description: Get a private stack with isolated data and hosting wherever you prefer: your infrastructure, public cloud or managed by Elven. Ideal for security, compliance (GDPR, SOC2) and deep integration with your environment.

features.title: Flexible hosting
features.desc: You choose where to run: AWS, Azure, GCP, on-prem, or on Elven.

features.title: Fully customizable
features.desc: Configure retention policies, sharding, high availability, and tailored backups.

features.title: Compliance & security
features.desc: Designed for companies requiring GDPR, SOC2, ISO or internal security standards.

features.title: SLA-backed support
features.desc: Access expert support with a formal SLA agreement.
